Reviews.Title: Good Entry Level Digital Camera!
Reviews.Author: rbhatta "A Dinosaur you can trust!"
Reviews.Content: This review is for Kodak EasyShare C813 8.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom, This camera is no frills easy to use point and shoot camera which I consider good if you pay less than $100.Remember Digital camera such as this does not come with SD/SDHC Memory card, The Internal 16MB memory is good only for 3-4 pictures, So you must always consider the cost of SD/SDHC memory card and a good set of Sanyo 2,700 mAh AA NiMH Rechargeable Batteries (4-Pack) into the cost before you make your decision in buying it.With careful shopping around (online and local superstores), you can get the camera and much needed accessories reviewed here for the price quoted above.PROS:[+} Very good pictures[+} Captures in HD resolution for 16:9 enhanced HDTV's[+] Decent startup time, fast control response and silent operation.[+] Easy to use with preset scene modes and dedicated Macro mode[+] Captures pictures upto 1250 ISO for those truly dark long exposure shoots[+] Better LCD preview than my other Fujifilm Finepix A900 9MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom reviewed here.[+] Works with SD/SDHC like Patriot PSF8GSDHC6 8GB Class6 Secured Digital SDHC Card without any firmware updates!CONS:[-] A picture when magnified looks grainier than my other FujiFlim Fine Pix A900 with side by side comparison of the same subject in focus.[-] A picture when compared with other cameras of this price range looks slightly overexposed but with exposure compensation we can deal with that issue.[-] A lot of plastic all around, No optical View Finder[-] Uses only two AA Batteries hence battery life is average, better buy High Capacity NiMH rechargeable and carry a set just in case you need them.[-] The Movies are made in *.MOV which can be seen only with ITUNES or QuickTime application installed on Windows based PC or natively in Apple Computers.[-] 640x480 is at 15frames/sec 320x480 is at 30frames/sec with audio.[-] Slightly bigger when compared to today's world of miniature Digital camera products.Kodak EasyShare C813 8.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom is a product with mixed bags of goodies and some quirks, however for a casual user none of the cons mentioned above does really matter if you can find this camera for a bargain price! Go get it!

Reviews.Title: A good camera except in the sun
Reviews.Author: Reviewer "Butterfly lady"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for several important occasions this summer.  I took it to my son's officer school military graduation.  All was fine until noontime on a sunny day when the squadrons were on parade.  Trying to take pictures outside, I discovered all that I could see on the screen was my own reflection.  I could not correctly aim the camera as the event unfolded.  There is no viewfinder.  I had pictures of the tops of peoples heads, the ground, etc, because I couldn't see what I was aiming at.  Later I called Kodak.  They suggested the beach setting, the snow setting, etc.  Nothing made a difference outside in sunlight.  I liked the camera very much, but because I take many pictures outside, I was forced to return it.  If only Kodak would add a viewfinder like my previous Easyshare DX 4330 had.  Reviews I had read did not mention this problem.  Most of my inside pictures were fine.  I also bought the dock, which I now cannot use, and rechargeable batteries.  The camera would only work in the dock with the battery pack that came with the camera.  Even though the camera itself will work with Kodak rechargeable batteries, the dock cannot sense it unless the dual pack that came with the camera is inside when you want to transfer pictures.Kodak EasyShare C813 8.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom

Reviews.Title: Not overly impressed and I wanted to be!
Reviews.Author: S. Evans "S. Evans"
Reviews.Content: I wanted something simple for my daughter and son to use that wasn't overly expensive. The salesman told me that this camera took great pictures. We have taken pictures in every mode that is offered and so far, I can say that it definitely does NOT take great pictures. If you are only interested in capturing a moment but aren't really concerned with quality, this camera should be fine. Otherwise, I wish now that I had just gone ahead and bought a more expensive one. I already had a 5 megapixel EasyShare, so I assumed the newer 8 megapixel would be a huge improvement. I am highly disappointed in the grainy quality of these pictures.

Reviews.Title: Happily Surprised
Reviews.Author: krohgster
Reviews.Content: This summer I was looking for a good, yet inexpensive digital camera. I agonized over which camera to buy, but finally was forced to purchase the Kodak EasyShare C813 due to its low price. When I received it in the mail, there was a significant lack of excitement as it was not my first choice.After using it to take well over 300 pictures so far, I am actually very happy I purchased this camera. The time between the button press and the actual picture being taken is almost nonexistent. The camera uses AA batters, however after all the pictures I have taken, I still have not had to recharge my 2500 mAh Ni-MH rechargable batteries. Not to mention the picture quality being much better than I had anticipated.When I installed the Kodak Easyshare software that came with the camera, my computer froze several times over the first three or four days I had it, forcing me to restart it several times. After those trying few days, however, I have not had any problems with it.I am very happy with my camera purchase, despite the software problems, and would definitely recommend this camera to other cost-minded individuals looking to purchase a decent digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I bought one of the Kodak C813's and returned it for a Samsung S860 for the same price.The Kodak's pictures were very grainy and the battery life is very short on a set of batteries.The EasyShare software was the only way Windows could see the camera.  Fedora 8 did detect it with no problems.  Hated to be locked into the EasyShare software.The Samsung S860 does a much better job.  It shows up as a USB drive to Windows XP and you can preview images and copy them with no problem without loading any software.  The S860 also has many more functions (such as voice notes for the photo) and settings.Don't waste your money on the C813!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for Vacation
Reviews.Author: LindseyLou#1 "Linds"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good quality digital camera to take on vacation. This was my answer. The pictures, as long as you are using the correct setting for the lighting, are crisp and clear. I was very pleased with the multiple capabilities of this camera. Would definately recommend it to others. I would offer some tip[s though, get a good set of rechargable batteries, know that this camera does not have an external speaker to hear your movie audio straight from the camera (you have to wait until you upload the movies to your PC), and be mindful of which settings work with each situation. But all around, I love my Kodak!

Reviews.Title: I'd give this ZERO stars....
Reviews.Author: BookLoverExtraordinaire
Reviews.Content: ...if I could. I purchased two of these cameras four months ago. Neither worked--they would not power on, which apparently is a common problem with this model. So I sent them to Kodak under the warranty--THREE TIMES. They kept sending back non-functioning cameras. Now I have #s 7 and 8 sitting on my porch waiting to be picked up yet again. They've been sitting there for 10 days and I doubt Kodak will pick them up. Kodak is not honoring their warranty. I even bought a new one from a camera store and it didn't work either. At least I could take that back to the store and get my money back. Kodak is a horrible company to try to deal with. I finally filed for a charge back on my credit card for the cost of the two cameras. Too bad. It used to be a good company.Update! I finally received two cameras that actually work! Just in time to cancel my chargeback. I did spend $35 for a rechargeable battery and I have to admit that works best, but it does take 2 AAs as it should SOMETIMES, but not always. The rechargeable is doing OK at this time, though. While I don't appreciate having to reward Kodak with another sale, at least our cameras are working now.

Reviews.Title: Excellent bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: J. Detchon
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for casual picture taking of friends and family, and I am surprised at the picture quality for such a low-priced camera. If you want a digital camera and you are on a budget, I highly recommend this item.Its very easy to use, easy to transfer to your computer or printer, it's just easy. Kudos Kodak!

Reviews.Title: Never buying another Kodak product EVER!!
Reviews.Author: Shoe Lover
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera (pink colored) from a local store. When I opened the camera it didn't work correctly and instead of just trying to return it to the store I followed the instructions inside the package stating that I shouldn't return the camera to the store and instead should contact Kodak support. HUGE MISTAKE! I was directed to send the camera to a repair facility (at my own cost I might add) and told they would fix it and send it back. I received a letter from the repair facility stating that they couldn't fix the camera and that Kodak would send me a replacement camera. Kodak indeed sent me a different camera; one that was refurbished and a different color. I specifically bought the camera because it was pink as I already have a silver one. I called Kodak customer service which was another joke. I could barely hear or understand the people. In addition, I was told that they had no pink in the C813 so I was out of luck. They told me the had a cheaper model C713 in pink that they could send me instead. I asked for a refund since this isn't what I had originally purchased and they told me they couldn't do that, that only the store I had purchased it from could've provided me with a refund but since I followed their instructions (sending the camera in for repair), I no longer have the original camera to return in order to get a refund!!!! I looked on this website for a refurbished C813 in pink and what do you know, they have one!! When I pointed this out to the guy on the phone, he told me that this website and the warehouse where they were sending my replacement from were two different entities and therefore I still couldn't get the camera I wanted. So in the end, my options were to either keep the silver one that I didn't want or suck it up and take the cheaper one in pink. I really wanted a pink one, so I'm out the $10 price difference, the difference in camera features and the original cost of shipping the camera for repair. They did arrange for UPS to pick up the old camera at their expense, after I told them I wasn't paying to return a second camera. I guess the moral of my story is that if you buy a camera that doesn't work, insist that the store you bought it from take it back; DO NOT send it to Kodak for repair because who knows what you'll end up with after all is said and done!!UPDATE: So the pink C713 I was suppose to get never arrived; instead they sent me back the Silver C813. Obviously the communication within Kodak stinks because they thought I sent the C813 in for repair! They returned the camera with a note that stated "we found your camera to be in working order...." when it was in fact suppose to be exchanged for the pink one. AGGGGGHHHH! I give up!!!!

Reviews.Title: great Camera
Reviews.Author: Caroline K. Owens "Caroline K."
Reviews.Content: VERY high quality pictures were made with this camera. I love it. I got mine from Wal Mart in a blue color and it's very nice. But, like all digital cameras, it DRAINS the batteries, like, within an hour. So I recommend getting rechargable batteries. It's the cheapest way to go. Also, this camera doesn't make the best videos, but it's not a video camera and at least it works. But the picture quality is AMAZING and the camera itself is very easy to use and user friendly. It's worth getting.

Reviews.Title: First one didn't work
Reviews.Author: J. Walters "Driven"
Reviews.Content: I had to return my original purchase for a replacement. The second worked fine. It was frustrating though because I bought it to take pictures of the birth of my first child and it worked the day before my c-section but not the day of. Sigh... I was at the hospital borrowing cameras etc.  I still like the ease and clarity of this camera though compared to my old one but I just wished it worked on the most important day of my life.

Reviews.Title: not bad for under $100!
Reviews.Author: Brian Novotney
Reviews.Content: this camera takes really good pictures for the price you pay.  however the screen is difficult to see when outside (the picture itself looks great on the computer once downloaded).  after 2 years (yeah we paid more than $100 at the time) the flash finally gave out...my mother-in-law had the same problem with the flash within the fisrt year and kodak fixed it free.  their service is excellent.  i feel its kind of a throw away after a couple of years...this little camera was great for us and easy to use...so much so i just ordered another kodak product (Z1285 easyshare camera)...even though the flash has died we still use it outdoors and it continues to perform....

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Kathryn E. Kula "kulaka"
Reviews.Content: While I do wish it had a viewfinder, I think that for the price, this is a great camera.  I purchased it over others becaue it is compatible with the printer/docking station that I bought with my previous camera (I bought this camera because the other one dropped in a parking lot and could not be repaired).  I am thrilled with the quality of the photos and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Vivian Taylor "West Coast Transplant"
Reviews.Content: First I questioned what was wrong with it that it's priced so low, my daughter had just purchased another brand for twice the price.  I have features she doesn't have, I have more megapixels and I love the quality of the photos.  Just enough for what I need.  I am not techno savvy like my twentysomething daughter, but I was able to manage the basics in record time.  Now, if I can just remember not to put my eye upon to the screen looking for the viewfinder...

Reviews.Title: A Good Pocket-size Camera!
Reviews.Author: Razorback Fan
Reviews.Content: This camera is lightweight and pocket sized, so  it will be great for taking on a trip! Not quite point-and-shoot, except in AUTO mode; but it does have settings for more than quick snapshots. I did purchase the 2GB Memory Card as well. It takes batteries, so the user will need to factor in batteries when taking it along. I don't know if there are rechargeables for this camera, but that would be worth investigating.This camera will supplement my larger and more cumbersome Kodak. The price--under $90--makes it a good buy.

Reviews.Title: This is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Gunnar Varela Mena
Reviews.Content: This is a great product! We are very happy with this camera, it has a good optical zoom and my photos are nicer!

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Kimberly R. Urban "ArtZPACarGal"
Reviews.Content: This was my third Kodak camera- before this I have had a 3.2mp and a 5mp camera and have always enjoyed them. This camera is much smaller and lighter and takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: G. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after my Kodak CX7530 finally died after being dropped.  I was looking for an inexpensive replacement before a beach trip.  I was very disappointed that I could not find a camera with a viewfinder because I had read the review regarding the sun making it impossible to see your subject.  I decided to try it.  I could not see my family and had to just shoot and hope I got something.  Also, the lettering on the buttons wore off in one week.  After our beach trip I returned the camera.  I purchased a Canon Power Shot SD1100.  Obviously I spent more but it is the quality I wanted and it has a viewfinder.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: J. Poppe
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of picture taking, and the wonderful features for different photo types.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use but not easy to get good photo
Reviews.Author: T.H. "peibelmont"
Reviews.Content: The pros of this camera:- it is very easy to use- it has a very intuitive menu- I love the separate flash button.The cons are:- the pictures are often fuzzy- the battery wears out pretty quickly (but it only uses 2 AA so it is easy to carry around another pair)- it takes a very very long time between the point you press the button and when the picture is actually taken. Forget getting any action shots.- The screen is very dim.  In the daytime you can not see the screen at all even when it is overcast.I have gotten a few lovely photos out of this camera but the bad photos are much more numerous.  This is really a camera for a beginner who likes doing still shots inside.I will be buying another type of camera to replace this one.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use but not easy to get good photo
Reviews.Author: T.H. "peibelmont"
Reviews.Content: The pros of this camera:- it is very easy to use- it has a very intuitive menu- I love the separate flash button.The cons are:- the pictures are often fuzzy- the battery wears out pretty quickly (but it only uses 2 AA so it is easy to carry around another pair)- it takes a very very long time between the point you press the button and when the picture is actually taken. Forget getting any action shots.- The screen is very dim.  In the daytime you can not see the screen at all even when it is overcast.I have gotten a few lovely photos out of this camera but the bad photos are much more numerous.  This is really a camera for a beginner who likes doing still shots inside.I will be buying another type of camera to replace this one.

Reviews.Title: Horrible pictures at night
Reviews.Author: vman76 "vman76"
Reviews.Content: I only bought this camera because I was able to get it for $60. It's not even worth that much. Any picture taken in less than ideal lighting condition comes out grainy. So essentially you get an 8 megapixel picture that looks about as good as the one you get from the phone on your camera. It comes with a proprietary USB cable to connect to your computer which is stupid. Why not use the standard one that all other digital camera's use? Lastly, to get the pictures on your computer you need to load the crappy Kodak software on there. Most other camera's don't require 3rd party software to transfer the pictures to your computer. To work around this, use a media reader to read the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Adrienne K. Weighall
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our 7-year-old last year for Christmas.  We wanted to find a camera that was not too expensive so it wouldn't be a big tragedy if it got broken.  The flash stopped working about three months after we had it.  When we finally got around to sending it in, they fixed the flash and sent it back and now it won't take videos.  When you turn it to video mode and push the shutter button, it takes a picture.  The picture quality is bad, too.  The pictures aren't as good as my first digital camera, which was a Canon 3 megapixel or my second, which was a Fuji 5 megapixel. I don't understand why they can't take that older technology and make a really good inexpensive camera for kids!  Most people don't need 8 megapixels (or more) anyway, and what good is a bigger picture if it looks like crap?  The Fisher-Price kids cameras with the big rubber case take such bad pictures that they are not even worth buying, in my opion. How is that fun for kids?  They want to be able to take pictures like mom does.  This camera was a real disappointment.

Reviews.Title: BEST PRICE
Reviews.Author: ENDERWIN "ENDERSIL"
Reviews.Content: THE PRICE IS, this camera is the best in its genre. HAVE EVERYTHING YOU NEED AN AVERAGE PERSON. VERY GOOD QUALITY PICTURES AND IS VERY LIGHT. 100% RECOMMENDED

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: George Laird
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our small kids who love to take digital pictures but I can't trust with my nicer cameras.  For an 8 megapixel camera with a large viewing screen, the price is terrific.  It has a small built in memory, which is nice but of questionable use.  We've turned down the resolution for our kids as they don't care and it creates more space.  If you are using this for real picture taking, you will need to buy a large SD card (like you would need to do with all cameras).  The buttons are easy to use which was another requirement we had.  Also, I consider the fact that the batteries are AA a plus as it eliminates the need for expensive, proprietary batteries.If you are a casual picture taker like most of us are, I see no reason to pay more for a camera that isn't going to offer you any real additional benefits.  This is a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Marita McCarty "M. McCarty"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my son and his fiance for Christmas and they love how easy it is to use and the quality of the photos.  It has a number of great features and is a terrific value for the money.  Would definitely recommend this product and this merchant.

Reviews.Title: Excellent kids camera - don't expect too much for the price
Reviews.Author: Jan Herbert "JH"
Reviews.Content: I have 3 kids & for each ones 5th birthday, they wanted a camera.  I ended up getting 3 versions of this Easyshare & all have past my expectations for such a thing.  It's cheap, it has better quality than a "real" kids camera (Fisher Price), & they're holding up well!  Our oldest one is 4 yrs. old & is still as good as new even though it's been played with by all three of my children.  And, as they were bought for my kids, they've taken quite a bit of abuse as well & they all worked perfectly.  I'd recommend this camera for anyone who wants to get a kid started in the world of photography.I gave it 4 stars because indoor pics can tend to be rather grainy, but what do you expect for $80?  I also wouldn't recommend this camera for anyone who's over the age of 10 who wants perfect-quality shots.  But as a fun camera that you don't want to spend a lot of money on, this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera!
Reviews.Author: Tracy L. Szaflarski "Tracy S"
Reviews.Content: DO NOT, I repeat, DO NOT purchase this camera.  It is absolutely a piece of junk.  It is horrible!  I hate it!  The optical zoom is a joke, the 8.2 mp do not make a difference and there is always a delay (when you press the button to take a picture, it doesn't work right away).  A lot of times, the pictures turn out fuzzy.  It is inexpensive for a reason - it's not worth anything.  It's definitely worth it to spend a little more money to have a nice quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for my use and the price paid
Reviews.Author: A. Chamish
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to backup my Canon Sx100.  I acquired it as it came as a real bargain ($35) bundled with a movie on DVD I bought at BB.  It works fine except that the C813 would not power on with two types of NIMH batteries I have.  Using quality rechargeable batteries solved the problem and for the price I paid this camera is performing well and then some! (decent quality pictures and short video clips, easy to operate and light weight)

Reviews.Title: Easy Share easy
Reviews.Author: M. P. Adams
Reviews.Content: This is my second EasyShare camera so I must like them. They are indeed easy to use and produce great pictures. The size fits perfect in my pants pocket so it is great for traveling.Maybe not for the geeky camera buff but for all around usage..it works

Reviews.Title: Starving For Light
Reviews.Author: Jerry M. Shults "Goldwing Jerry"
Reviews.Content: Great camera for daylight, fast action, video, great zoom. It lacks a little in the low light,arena. It is a great deal for the price that I payed.

Reviews.Title: Good picture - long lag time
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I loved my 4 year old small, inexpensive digital camera, which took good pictures.  But of course with more megapixels, you get a better picture. I like the handy size. What I don't like about this camera is that there is a long lag time before it is ready to shoot the next picture.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: DCP
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother who said that she didn't want anything too complicated for her to use. It is her first digital camera & even though it is loaded with features, she seeemed to catch on very quickly on how to operate the basic functions & so far, is very pleased with its ease of use & quality of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Fargo
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera for my mom for her birthday.  It is her first digital camera.  She LOVES it!  She and my dad traveled to Arizona and she took it with her.  It takes great pics and is easy to use!  Good size too.  Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Just Ok
Reviews.Author: Cheri Freytag "Cheri"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera less than a year ago and was recently at my best friends bridal shower when it stopped working, it would turn on and then quickly turn itself off showing a lens error. I loved the camera before this and was able to use it in many situations but I think a camera of this price should last more than a year.

Reviews.Title: Just an OK camera
Reviews.Author: J. Miller "smurfybabe"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it was cheap and now I'm wishing I'd looked around a little more.  The pictures it takes seem to be inconsistant, when I keep it on auto it sometimes takes really good pictures and sometimes really grainy ones.  I've noticed that most of the time, it takes better pictures outside then it does inside, regardless of how much light there is.I'm not sure if my battery compartment is labeled wrong, but I always end up turning the batteries around a couple times when I first put them in because it won't start.  As soon as it starts it's fine, it's just getting them in right even if I try to use the little "guide" on the compartment.The video is the one thing I do like about this, I've never really taken video before, but it's very easy to do with this camera and always turns out well.  Even in places where the still pictures turn out crappy, the video seems to turn out fine.Overall, if you're just looking for a cheap camera this one won't give you too many problems, but if you're looking for high quality pictures, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. I almost took it back after reading some of the reviews here. I am so glad I didn't!  I'm not sure why some people have had the problems stated in other reviews. It is very simple to use. My first use was in a rare snow storm in our area, and the quality of the pictures is great! No red eye, excellent colors and no blurring at all. The only small issue, is that you cannot see the screen in the sun. BUT, just point and click and the pictures were perfect!  And that only happened in a few of the pictures taken.  There is a setting for bright snow and it worked great.I am not a seasoned photographer, just a person who loves to take pictures to capture memories. Easy to upload to facebook, kodak easyshare or your local store for online developing. I would definitely recommend it. At least, give it a try before you believe all of the negative comments.

Reviews.Title: Great little 8.2MP camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dana Jones
Reviews.Content: Still getting compliments on this snazzy little camera a year after I bought it!  Takes clear, crisp pictures, and it's easy to use.  Love that it uses rechargeable AA's, and the 2GB memory card I use with it has more memory than I've ever needed, even on vacation.

Reviews.Title: kodak c813 digital camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Lelievre
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son and his wife to take pix of their new son. Pix are great, features are good. The only thing I'd change is the AA batteries need to be changed frequently and result in missed opportunities for "Kodak moments". Otherwise,it's a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: I keep using it
Reviews.Author: M. Soliman "Umm_Anas"
Reviews.Content: I love it. The price was perfect. this is my first Digital camera. I am still trying to figure out how to use all the features. When I get time I will read the manual.You would need a memory card. the camera comes with TEN picture only.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Steven Ball "Oboedude"
Reviews.Content: After my old digital camera broke I needed to replace it fairly inexpensively and quickly. The Kodak EasyShare C813 is a great little camera for users who don't need all the features of a digital SLR or users who don't have the money to drop down for such a camera. My only complaint is Kodak compacted the mode dial on top and put a ton of modes in the menu which is kind of a pain to find the mode you want. Otherwise I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Eats batteries
Reviews.Author: C. Vance
Reviews.Content: Had a Samsung before and it was a great digital camera...until my hubby broke the screen on it.  Then we had to buy a new one.  Purchased this one at K-Mart, of all places, and went through a dozen batteries in a one-month period of time.  So I'm thinking Kodak doesn't make a good camera, they should just stick to film.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Laurie W. "lauword"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera(pink) as a Christmas gift.  I have taken several videos and pictures since and have had no problem.  Pictures are acceptable for the price and videos run great using Google Picasa softare(hate EasyShare).  The original batteries took about ten pictures and then where dead so I purchased some AA Lithium and have taken six to seven videos and 50 or so pictures, and still going strong.  The only problem I have had is when connecting USB cable to upload pictures, camera will not power on and off with the USB cable plugged in.  Started using card reader to avoid this problem.  I have read other reviewers who say it won't power on after a while at all so I hope I do not run into this problem!

Reviews.Title: Good Gift
Reviews.Author: LightSkin401 "Amazon User"
Reviews.Content: Bought this item aas a gift for a family member who had never had a digial camera, this was a good start for the person they seem to like it and it came very quickly

Reviews.Title: Awesome Purhcase
Reviews.Author: A. Watkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift two years in a row for two different people.  Both thoroughly enjoy the camera...and for the price, so did I!

Reviews.Title: Reviewers were right.
Reviews.Author: Barb Short
Reviews.Content: Other reviewers were right.  Do not buy this camera.  We ordered another Kodak model that had better reviews but were sent this one by mistake(?)  It worked fine when my husband opened it on Christmas Day.  The next day it was dead.  Replacing batteries did nothing.  After checking the reviews on this model we decided just to send it back and my husband bought a camera from another company.

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: Virginia Grover "Daye"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for a beginner like me.  Takes great pictures, just point and shoot. Easy to edit. Easy to take everywhere.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Daughter is thrilled
Reviews.Author: Judy A. Ratliff "deal finder"
Reviews.Content: The camera I purchased replaced one lost at a concert. Thanks to Amazon.com and the company whom had the camera for sale,it was easy to replace. I am very happy I checked here and got the deal I did. When this company is selling something used, you can bet it still works great.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful first digital camera
Reviews.Author: R. Smith "crankymama27"
Reviews.Content: I bought this gift for my daughter for Christmas.I love Kodak's easy share features. I have the much upgraded version myself and love it and for a teen found this one in a great price range and with everything she was looking for. If paired with the printer ( sold seperately) it prints out beautiful pictures. I am sure she will find much to take pictures of now.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the Money!
Reviews.Author: wayne meier "Bad Brad"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased at the quality of images that this little camera does. It is everything I need in a camera and more, who needs the more expencive type when this one delivers the goods very accuately.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare point & shoot
Reviews.Author: Charmayne Burke-roberts "Lady C"
Reviews.Content: I love Kodak Easyshare cameras, after my other easyshare was broken I purchase the 8.2.  I love the on/off button on this one because the other one don't have an on/off button which means the battery does not run down.  The price was right for me I would tell anyone to purchase this product would will love it, and the video part is better then a camcorder.  All you have to do point & shoot, and what great pictures it makes.  I can print out my own picture with my print dock.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: E. Alfonso "Edyalf"
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price paid. It Has not given me any trouble at all. High Quality images, easy software work and pocket size. I wish it would  come with rechargable bateries and not the regular ones. I had to buy a battery charger (not a problem really).Good Stuff. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: not coming on after new set battries install
Reviews.Author: GOOD LUCK
Reviews.Content: WORKED GOOD FOR A FEW PICTURES WERE TAKEN THEN FAILED TO TURN ON, INSTALLED NEW SET OF BATTERIES STILL FAILED TO TURN ON. RETURNING TO KODAK TO SEE IF THEY WILL REPAIR GOOD LUCK I HOPE.

Reviews.Title: Target had it for $59.99
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Raji "shop around"
Reviews.Content: Bought the same camera at Target for $59.99 on sale. Normally $89.99.Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware!
Reviews.Author: R. White
Reviews.Content: My daughter was given this camera for Christmas. It broke within a week, the dial no longer turns. I should have been wary. I received a C743 last Christmas and after a couple of months of using it, it no longer powered on.  After returning the camera for repairs three times, they finally replaced a circuit board(?)and it works fine. But from other reviews I have since read and friends who have purchased this camera, these problems are not uncommon. - Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for people starting out with thier first camera, it worked for about 9 months for me it started breaking down, the lens would make weird sounds and wouldn't go in. I would keep it under warenty, it took great pictures, just not the camera itself.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: R. Anaya
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son as a Christmas gift.  I had bought two other Kodak cameras as gifts in previous years so I knew it was a great product. Like the others, this one is also a great camera!  Its easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: John Henzel
Reviews.Content: junk christmas day would not turn on, no pic of christmas 2008, $8.00 to return for repairs 7-10 days ? to get it back. payed 79.00 for it on sale now for 59.00,

Reviews.Title: Super Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Aleksandar Miljkovic "anaca34"
Reviews.Content: This Digital Camera make best photo and very good video with sound for this price is best Digital Camera !!!

Reviews.Title: great product with poor batteries
Reviews.Author: J. Wilson
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is great. It has great picture quality and it's easy to use. The only thing is the batteries it comes with suck. Once I changed to lithium batteries everything was good.

Reviews.Title: Too Fragile!
Reviews.Author: Scoop
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera ($89) for my teenage daughter last Xmas. Within a couple of weeks, the lens became stuck. Target exchanged it for a new one. Eight months later, same problem.. now it's trash! My niece got the same cam, same time, and hers had the same problem. Sound like a weak design? You bet! No more Kodak cams for us.. I am looking at Canon A470. A friend of mine has an Olympus that is about 8 yrs old, and looks like it was dropped 100 times. It still works. Clean up you act Kodak!

Reviews.Title: No more Kodak cameras for me!
Reviews.Author: M. Whitt
Reviews.Content: This is the second Kodak camera that I have owned. The first one didn't last long enough to take 200 pictures with. This one would not even power on with a memory disk installed. No more Kodak cameras for me!

Reviews.Title: Best Kodak ever
Reviews.Author: Golden Means
Reviews.Content: Had no problem getting my kodak and it it working just fine. I couldn't best the price I paid for this. Thanks

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Edward Moyers
Reviews.Content: its wonderfull yes  just like the last,one i had  but i didnt know this one was 8.1 mga pix .. the last one was 7.0 but this one is the same and very good

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive alternative
Reviews.Author: Evan Frankl
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive digital cameras have largely been replaces by camera phones, but if you still have a phone without a data plan, this is a wonderful, simple, inexpensive digital camera. Downloading images to your desktop or laptop is very easy.

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: awesome. best camera ever. I love it.i do not leave homewithout this . def take the clearest best pictures. always a pleasure

Reviews.Title: Good camera for elderly mom
Reviews.Author: E.S. "Colette"
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my mother a few years ago.  She is now in a retirement community and I found her camera for her so she could get back into taking pictures of flowers and scenery in her new home.  It is very simple, and with the SanDisk card, I can take her to the local drugstore and get her favorite pictures printed so she can mail them to her friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Published Author
Reviews.Content: This camera  is fantastic and it is easy to operate.  The cost when compared to local merchant's cost is great, especially when  the "free shipping" feature is added.  You save when you shop on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Lina Perez
Reviews.Content: Good productDoes the jobWill recommend it to othersGood for the priceNo problems so far. With it.

Reviews.Title: Fast & Easy shopping experience
Reviews.Author: Betsy Durkee
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed.  Fast service and fair price!  I felt like the description given to me was described just how the camera came!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, great price & fast delivery!
Reviews.Author: Charles Astleford
Reviews.Content: Everything went smoothly and love the camera...thanks!  Camera is easy to use and takes great pictures.  What could be better?

Reviews.Title: reflections problem m340
Reviews.Author: mainelady
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare M340 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Green)Outside shots are totally problematic as all you see is yourself in the crazy "viewfinder". As we are beach and outdoor people, this renders the camera useless, as all you can do is guess at what you are looking at, as the MIRROR image of yourself is what you will always see! OK for inside shots, and in shadow. NOT very versatile otherwise. Glad I have my old dependable one for outdoor photography.

Reviews.Title: Grand daughter likes it!
Reviews.Author: willg
Reviews.Content: 13 year old grand likes it. The camera was shipped promptly. Works fine but not to well in low light. Camera had a crack in battery door that was not mentioned in description. But I was able to get that takened care of. She don't mind and that's all that matters. For the price it is a deal for some one to start with before moving on to a more advance camera. Thanks. Will be checking for other bargains.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and result is good.But accessories not available.
Reviews.Author: shafiur
Reviews.Content: I took a lot of photograph by this camera and I was satisfied with the result. But I kept the camera unused for a few months and now I found that it is gone. I cannot open it and it become hot if the battery put inside. I consulted some technician in Dhaka, Bangladesh but useless. They mentioned that the Kodak accessories not available in Bangladesh. Such a big company has no agent or service center here.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Sam Moss
Reviews.Content: I found this camera able to do all I ask of it and use it everyday at work to record pictures needed for billing and inventory....good product and reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: I Loved It
Reviews.Author: Zee-Bilt
Reviews.Content: I Loved this Camera!!!!!!!!! It took great clear pictures. I could be in a moving car and take a picture out the window and most of the time it took a clear picture. I could zoom in all the way and the picture would be incredibly clear. It was so easy for me to use, and I am the type that can barely figure out how to turn on my computer.(I not that dumb, but you get the point). The only problem I had was one day I turned it on and my screen was white. When I took a picture and downloaded it to my computer it was white as well.I don't know if it had to do with all the times i dropped it or if it was something else, what ever it was I am very sad because I loved that camera. And I lost all the papers to so I can't send it back to the company, which was my fault. But over all it was an amazing camera and I loved using it. I definitely recommend it!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good to work with.
Reviews.Author: iRodSoup "iRod"
Reviews.Content: this camera isn't good or bad. it's just the right for you if you have a low budget. but does anyone know if this works on a macbook pro?

Reviews.Title: as described
Reviews.Author: linkinlover87
Reviews.Content: It was as described. Not the best condition but it was sold accordingly. Great for the price. I needed something inexpensive and quick. The product met both those needs.

Reviews.Title: So So Camera
Reviews.Author: Matthew Wietzke
Reviews.Content: This camera is bulky and doesn't take that great of photos.  I wish I would have read some of the online reviews before I purchased this.  The pictures are grainy and the camera doesn't have a lot of features.  It is a good BASIC camera if that's all you want.  But this camera eats up batteries like there's no tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: bugsbunny2795
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and I must say I am pleased with it. I only have one complaint. It doesnt take the picture right away, there's a pause before the picture is taken so you have to time everything. I take pictures of my cat and I can't get all of his funny behaviours because they happen too quickly. The camera is good to take with you on vacation. I recently went to DC for vacation and was able to take great pictures of all of the monuments. It's a good camera all in all.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera Overall
Reviews.Author: Apollos
Reviews.Content: I've had my C813 for almost 2 yrs now. I like the camera and think it does a good job overall. As with most products, there are some positive and negative points to mention:The LCD screen on the back of the camera is very user-friendly... it's very large so it's easy to sight in your subject. On the other hand, as someone else pointed out, it is often difficult to take shots on a bright sunny day, because the image you see in the LCD screen is almost "washed out" by the sun's glare. Sometimes the prints I get back from these shots look over-exposed, but usually they turn out all right.The camera has a light exposure function but it's rather awkward locating it and using it. Plus, when you stop it down for less light and then take the picture, the light exposure returns to its normal wide open position and you have to manually stop it down again for the next shot. Another thing that's very important: look to see whether the date stamp is turned "on" or "off" in your camera. Because if it is "on", all of your photographs will have the date printed in big, bright gold numbers at the bottom of each picture. And the date CANNOT be removed once the shot has been taken, not even with photo editing sofware. So if you don't want the date stamped in big gold letters on the bottom of each photograph, then be sure to turn OFF the date stamp function BEFORE you start taking pictures. I took some pictures of landscaping once with beautiful flowers and shrubs and trees, and the date is on every one of them in big gold letters right across some of the most beautiful parts of the photographs... a real BUMMER!I gave the camera 4 stars simply because the vast majority of the pics I've taken have turned out very well. They are very sharp, and the colors are incredibly vivid and true. Plus, I like the fact that the camera is so small you can actually put in your shirt pocket. I've also used my C813 to take pics through my telescope and got some surprisingly good shots of the Moon and of Jupiter, too.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my Mom who knows nothing about anything digital. So easy to use and takes very nice pictures. It's a little bulky but for an easy point and shoot it's great.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera for children and adults
Reviews.Author: sun's mom
Reviews.Content: I was given this camera a year ago and have had it in my purse ever since so I won't miss a special moment. It is a great camera for those who don't want to fuss with lens settings etc. It does all the work for you and has many options that are all built in and are easy to use.  I bought one for a 76 year old friend and my niece bought one for her seven year old daughter.  We are all enjoying terrific pictures with little effort. This camera does not take good night pictures of lights [like Christmas] but fulfills all my other needs year round.  Two things I would suggest purchasing are Lithium batteries as Alkaline are not long lasting in the camera,[copper tops don't work well at all], and a larger SD card. The lithium batteries I put in last year are still going strong and I purchased a card for a few dollars on line which holds 300 pictures. There are extras included with the camera that make it even more enjoyable. Look around the internet and you can find it for around $80.00 new. A later model is now out, but I found that this was the better of the two for me.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jess K.
Reviews.Content: This product is easy to use and worth the price. Although if you keep the batteries in the camera they die extremely quickly

Reviews.Title: good results with the  c813
Reviews.Author: rolac
Reviews.Content: Have used the camera for approx 8 months, have no adverse comments.  Easy to use, heavy use (with a 4 g memory card) have printed many photos, transferred to computer many times, others in family have used much, with only complaint being poor view of screen in sunlight.  Like well enough that another was purchased for daughter in June.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Jody Decker
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera.  It's easy to use and takes good pictures.  It was shipped in a timely manner, & arrived in good condition.

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot
Reviews.Author: uscolb
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother and she just loves it.  The camera is simple to use and downloads pictures quickly. Great buy for a beginner.

Reviews.Title: Ms
Reviews.Author: srgordon "nurse1"
Reviews.Content: Easy share as the name implies is easy to use, good point and shoot,and Kodak is always a brand you can count on.  Reasonable pricing!

Reviews.Title: My first digital camera
Reviews.Author: Khaki "Cathy"
Reviews.Content: I am mosten likely the last person on Earth to buy a digital camera. Having no other d. camera to compare it to this may not be the most helpful review. Having said that- I love this camera. The camera tells you what to do right on the viewing screen. Takes beautiful pics. and easy to load into the computer. Once you get used to its' small size & buttons it's a breeze. Even records video, tho, needs a large memory card. Go get one.

Reviews.Title: Nice but not better than a nikon
Reviews.Author: TSHU10 "TS"
Reviews.Content: I think this is a nice camera for the price, however, I wish that I would have chose another camera. The features are great, but they DO NOT do what they are made to do. I took a vacation to Miami and a lot of the beautiful shots I took did not come out right. I think the best feature is the auto shot. As I said, its great for the price but I should have chosen something else.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Mr. Dee Pelham
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare C813 8.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical ZoomDOES A VERY GOOD JOB FOR ME. EVERYTHING I EXPECTED IT TO BE.DEE

Reviews.Title: Kodak
Reviews.Author: Anne Heath
Reviews.Content: This C813 is not my first Kodak and I wanted another.  It has met and maybe exceeded my expectations.  While this camera can be a battery hog, draining often, this one hasn't yet done that.  I would recommend buying rechargable batteries.  In all, this was a great buy for the money and my needs.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Barbara Calderon "Grannyellen"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son who loves it - beautiful photos and they print out wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Eeeeeeeeeeek!
Reviews.Author: Terrica Beard-Thomas "HanceSkye"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera and loved it it instantly. Then it would not turn on the second day. Changed the batteries and the same thing happened within twenty four hours. Got a replacement, and it was the same was again. Sent it back for a refund. Can not afford to be buying batteries every day.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: David Link "sierracanon"
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for my daughter for her birthday.  She loves it, and found it easy to use, with great picture quality.  And a great price on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Excited - now waiting
Reviews.Author: M. Larue
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to see the camera come in at such a cheap price. I was always reluctant to go to the digital cameras, as I always prefered film - and the suprise of the prints that comes with them. I had my C813 for about two weeks when the first day that I took it out beyond taking a few pictures around the house it stopped powering on. Now I have to wait for a replacement and am a bit dissapointed in that. Not cause I have to return it - but, I got my mother a C613 and right when she took it out of the package the lense wouldnt open - thus needing me to return that one. I hope it is just a HUGE coincidence that both my Kodak products purchased within 3 months barely worked and that both my mother's new camera and the one I am now waiting on works for the long run.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C813 Camera
Reviews.Author: David  L Southworth
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a trip to California and back to Florida, took 800+ photos. All turned out exceptionally good.  This camera took about 300 photos (none w/flash) just on the rechargeable battery pack (about $9 or $10) and I had two AA cells in a case as back up. It took photos inside very dark Spanish cathedrals because of the great 1250 ISO rating.  I took lots of photos from the car window while moving and they turned out very clear and any street signs were very readable. I simply connect the camera to the computer with the USB cord and the camera shows up as another drive, so then I just copy/paste photos from the camera to the computer.  Also I can use the included Kodak software for transfer but I prefer the simpler copy/paste.  The camera has no problem showing up as another drive (much like a flash drive added to the computer USB port). If you copy/paste photos they are all numbered serially to help keep them in order for viewing if you should add them to a viewing program.  The only minor problem is that in a very bright outdoors environment it is somewhat difficult to view the area to be included in the photo, but certainly not impossible, not a problem for me but maybe for others. This is a very easy to use camera; when I wanted someone to take a photo for me I just asked they push and hold the button for a second or two and no one had any problem taking a good photo. The simplicity of photo taking is a real advantage as I could pull the camera from my pocket and snap a photo in seconds, then review it to see if I needed to take another photo; if so, I snapped the next photo within 5 or 10 seconds.  I have the recharging/printing dock also which is really helpful; keeps the rechargeable battery always fully charged and camera ready to go anytime. Photos printed from the dock look just like from any photo shop w/excellent color.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price...
Reviews.Author: Floyd Goodrich "Jim G."
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my ten year old grand daughter and she took to it like a duck to water. In no time she was using most of the modes and having a blast. For a low priced 8MP camera its pretty nice. It lacks image stabilization, face detection, and the video is 15 frames per second not 30 like more expensive cameras, so the video is slightly jerky. When reviewing the video on the camera, the video lacks sound but you get the sound when you download onto a computer. I was impressed on how well it took photo's in low light using the low light setting, as good as much more expensive cameras. This camera gives you a lot for the price so the 5 stars are based on price versus performance. Remember, its meant to be your first digital camera but definitely not your last. If your looking for a good cheap camera, you've found one, you really can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: A Piece of Unworthy Trash
Reviews.Author: Mattiene A. Moustakas
Reviews.Content: Stay away from this piece of garbage. I bought this little silver deceiver, loaded the battery, and ran through the functions, and they all seemed to work. A week later I tried to turn it on, and it didn't work. I tries several new batteries and nothing again. Now I'm told I have to send this new unit to a repair center. I'm told its still under warranted, but if I am told that any charges will be levied, I will just tell them to keep the inferior thing, or toss it, or place it where the sun won't shine. Kodak, like other American brands, is not what it used to be.Mattiene-Arienne Moustakas, Syracuse NY

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: TPJr "TRP"
Reviews.Content: For the money, this works great. Simple to operate, quality pictures and works nice with both XP and Vista. Have not had the chance to plug it into my Linux unit yet, so that I can not comment on.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Twin Oaks
Reviews.Content: The instruction booklet is easy to follow. I am more a user than a readerand I took pictures immediately. Did myself a misfavor by not reading; I left the camera on and drained my batteries. Overall it is easy to use and I'm happy. Great shipping. Thanks to the seller.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Mark Rinehart
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a great price. Takes very nice pictures and has plenty of options for most users. Amazon does a super job in shipping products in a very timely manner and with great care.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Martha J. Dunbar
Reviews.Content: I purchased a C813 Kodak camera for my daughters birthday gift...She is very pleased with it..

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it unless you want to rip out all of your hair.
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I could show you the countless and wasted hours of making videos and photos. Including the terrible photos of my wedding that were taking with this piece of trash. It doe not know how to focus or get the right color. I'm ticked how yellow the pictures and videos become normal to yellow and blurry. I just spent 8 hours today with this piece of junk trying to set up my online store. I wasted all 8 hours! HOORAY!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Re-veiw
Reviews.Content: Works great has small broken part but seller. Made well aware. Still hold up good. The price also reflected that. Good cheap camera for all purpose use

Reviews.Title: my  kodak  easyshare camera
Reviews.Author: A. Lueskow
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Kodak EasyShare C813 Digital Camera with 3x zoom.  I ordered on a Friday night.  It arrived Monday morning.  I have used, used, and used it and it works perfect.  It arrived very fast and I am extremely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: great little camera.
Reviews.Author: sammyboyglass "sam"
Reviews.Content: I think the camera is very good , but does'nt have a big enough card.

Reviews.Title: Camera did not work
Reviews.Author: Susan Shepherd
Reviews.Content: I received the camera and it did not work.  I would like a replacement camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Caleb Bishop "Caleb Bishop"
Reviews.Content: i was looking for something cheep and good Qulity well thes kodak camera fit the bill it takes great photos even of moving water i LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Can't wait to get rid of this camera
Reviews.Author: E. citsay
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Canon Power Shot, which I loved, thinking the Kodak Easy Share c613 would be a better working camera for my business.  I sell on ebay for a living and pictures are extremely important!  This camera from the start has been nothing but trouble!  It freezes up and I have to pull the batteries to get it working again.  I can't tell you how many times the software has stopped working unexpectedly and I have to go to the kodak website to trouble shoot.  I can't tell you how many times I have plugged in the usb cable and nothing happens and I am stuck with turning it on/off, turning my computer on/off, restarting the software and you name it to get it working again.  I am so angry right now because I am in the middle of my work AGAIN and it is not working.  We went to a wedding this weekend and all but 1 picture have to be tossed because it takes such crappy indoor pictures.  I have had good experience with daytime indoor pictures as long as I am right next to a bright window.  When it is too sunny, forget it.  DON'T BOTHER WITH THIS CAMERA, IT IS NOT WORTH THE HASSLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: It's Good
Reviews.Author: Abbygail Mckenzie-gibson
Reviews.Content: I like this product.  It was just what I expected.  The only problem I had is that the batteries gave up life after only twelve picture shots

Reviews.Title: nice cam!!!!
Reviews.Author: Angel Conce "KoRn_eta"
Reviews.Content: nice camera, im disappointed with photos taken in the dark, but in general is a good camera.I bought it for a friend of mine and havent use it long time, maybe that's the reason i dont give it five stars.

Reviews.Title: I did not like.
Reviews.Author: by Betty English
Reviews.Content: I did not like cause I never did get the Camera. and I do not want to get another ever.

Reviews.Title: too expensive on amazon
Reviews.Author: shoppers "man utd"
Reviews.Content: i got this camera for less than $100 in my local target store. why is amazon jacking up the price?

Reviews.Title: Photos great, software confusing
Reviews.Author: novice "Shirley"
Reviews.Content: [[ASIN:B000ZH6J94 Kodak EasyShare C813 8.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom]]The pictures are excellent and the camera easy to operate.  However I am not good with computers and I found the directions for the software inadequate and it difficult to figure out how to do the simple things I wanted -- Email or print a favorite picture.

Reviews.Title: C813 camera
Reviews.Author: Luanne L. Strosahl "Luanne"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, but the batteries don't stay charged. I replaced them with Kodak batteries and they still died with the first use.

Reviews.Title: BIG SURPRISE
Reviews.Author: Thomas F. Mccartin
Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT IS EVEN BETTER THAN ADVERTIZED. IT HAD FEATURES TO IMPROVE PICTURES ALREADY TAKEN.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.2-megapixel resolution for stunning prints up to 30 x 40 inches
3x optical zoom lens, 5x digital zoom; HD still capture and VGA video
2.4-inch indoor/outdoor color LCD
Digital image stabilization reduces blur
Compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare C813 8.2 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Zoom
